page.title: 04Law and Order
page.content: At Stansted police station they cover a lot of towns as well as Stansted. They have to cover Farnham, Elsenham, Rickling, Quendon, Manuden, Birchanger, Burton End, Broxted, Duton Hill, and Tilty. They work different shifts with a partner, they work at least 8 hours a day. The police in Stansted work from 6 a.m. to 2 p.m. 2 p.m. to 10 p.m. 10 p.m. to 6 a.m. They can work other shifts if necessary. Stansted police work for a week and 2 days off, and the same again, then a week and 3 days off. At Stansted station there are 11 police men, 1 seargent, school officers, 1 office man, 2 men per shift, 1 man at Elsenham, and 4 special constables. At Stansted police station they have 2 cars, in these cars they have a radio, cones, police signs, tape measures, a broom, a first aid box,
